other_tests.findings: Complex 81-77-76-mm retroperitoneal mass (with T2 enhancement and central necrosis) near the right kidney, initially reported as consistent with a retroperitoneal sarcoma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat MRI imaging postpartum demonstrated a second mass in the right presacral region.

other_tests.findings: Elevated dopamine and noradrenaline levels of 3482 nmol per 24 hours (RR 400–2600) and 979 nmol per 24 hours (RR 70–500), respectively.
Two lesions, both 2.2 cm in maximum diameter, one to the left of the aorta and one between the superior mesenteric artery and the aorta.
Mildly elevated at 1130 pmol/L (RR 0-900) with a normal plasma metanephrine level.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Three-fold elevated normetanephrines during the eighth pregnancy.

other_tests.findings: Significantly elevated at 7770 pmol/L (RR 900) with normal metanephrine and chromogranin A of 31 U/L (RR 0-20 U/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significantly elevated again at 7680 pmol/L (RR 900) during the second pregnancy.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed two lesions: one adjacent to the right carotid body and a second adjacent to the inferior vena cava posterior to the caudate lobe of the liver.
